H0.text: Who is the oldest person to have a number one hit in Britain. Cliff Richard

H1.text: Who is the oldest person to have a number one hit in Britain. Vera Lynn

H2.text: Who is the oldest person to have a number one hit in Britain. Tony Bennett

H3.text: Who is the oldest person to have a number one hit in Britain. Sachmo

A4.text: In 2009, Vera Lynn became the oldest living artist to top the UK Albums Chart at the age of 92.

A5.text: With this achievement, she surpassed Bob Dylan as the oldest artist to have a number one album in the UK.
